title: Australian Security Intelligence Organisation
summary: The Australian Security Intelligence Organisation (ASIO /ˈeɪzioʊ/) is Australia's national security agency responsible for the protection of the country and its citizens from espionage, sabotage, acts of foreign interference, politically motivated violence, attacks on the Australian defence system, and terrorism.[3][4] ASIO is compared to the American FBI and the British MI5.[5] ASIO is part of the Australian Intelligence Community.
